embed.title: Support
embed.description: Select an option below to open a ticket! This will generate a private Discord channel between you and the moderators/admins on here.

fields.name: Please, provide as much default in your ticket as possible!
fields.value: This helps us help you faster.

fields.name: 💡 Suggestion
fields.value:
Share an idea.
Please check <#953014425969889350> first!

fields.name: 🪲 Bug
fields.value:
Report an issue.
Please check <#953014350132678706> first!

tickettypes.name: Help
tickettypes.message: Hello %user%! Please describe your problem in detail so we can help you as soon as possible.

tickettypes.name: Bug
tickettypes.message:
Hello %user%! Please provide the following so we can reproduce the bug:

**Steps to reproduce the bug**
**Expected result**
**Actual result**
**Your In Game Name**
**Which server you are playing on (Khavalon/Asthonia)**

tickettypes.name: Suggestion
tickettypes.message: Hello %user%! Please describe your suggestion in detail!
